price: A prestupnici će se po biljezima svojim poznati, pa će za kose i za noge ščepani biti,
arabic: يُعۡرَفُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ بِسِيمَٰهُمۡ فَيُؤۡخَذُ بِٱلنَّوَٰصِي وَٱلۡأَقۡدَامِ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yuʿ'rafu al-muj'rimūna bisīmāhum fayu'khadhu bil-nawāṣī wal-aqdāmi
